title.rendered: Alticor Inc Releases CONNECT Safety Promotional Video

content.rendered:
We believe that sending our people home safely every day is the most important thing we do – it’s the Alticor Inc Way. We are dedicated to improving the industry through leadership involvement, employee engagement and accountability.

We take our commitment to providing a safe work environment so seriously that we have developed a systematic program called Safety Accountability for Everyone (SAFE). Our SAFE logo illustrates the three fundamental elements of our SAFE program, which include check, connect, and commit. We are rolling out our new CONNECT video which highlights how everyone in our safety network impacts safety. Our obligation to provide a SAFE workplace extends to all facets of our projects and our communities. We CONNECT with our employees, industry partners, subcontractors and clients to identify and resolve safety issues.

Are YOU in?  https://youtu.be/YnBGne_QbtQ
